Text: Do you have a collection of 2008 to current songs?  I have a cavs unit and the hard drive failed.  So I lost all the songs on there and Cavs wants me to re-buy them ($900 or so).  So I have to resort to other methods to replace my collection.  I have all the older music up to about 2007.  So whatever you have would be most appreciated.  Thanks.
Hi there ! What do you use to play these tracks with the lyrics showing? Thanks!!
Ok, here is the secret!  Extract the file and then download VLC player.  Open the extracted file with VLC and you get both words and music!  VLC is free and great!  It absolutely plays everything!
